ValidationRule.description: Force update of the Stop Welcome Call Automated Emails field when the Interview scheduled field has been checked.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ( Send_Welcome_Call_Automated_Emails__c = True), ( Stop_Welcome_Call_Automated_Emails__c = False), ( Interview_Scheduled__c = TRUE ), (NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator"))) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must click the 'Stop Welcome Call Automated Emails' field to move forward
